hex_points.blurb: A fog-laden village where whispers of lost souls linger.
An ancient shrine, its bell broken, echoing the past.
A hidden lair beneath twisted roots; a lurking presence.
A temporary camp where travelers share their dark tales.
A sunken dungeon filled with waterlogged despair and shadow.
A forgotten forge, the anvil rusted, yet imbued with memories.
A shimmering portal to unknown realms, crackling with latent energy.
Ruins of an old manor, where grief lingers in every crevice.
A village overtaken by nature, its past inhabitants long gone.
A shrine swallowed by vines, a forgotten prayer echoes softly.
A campfire shared by wary travelers, the mood heavy with sorrow.
A submerged dungeon, its water filled with sorrowful echoes.
A lair of despair where the creatures are fuelled by sadness.
An ancient forge nestled in the fog, offering second chances.
A portal hidden within the marsh, radiating an ominous glow.

quests.title: The Bell's Last Toll
quests.summary: Restore the ancient shrine bell to lift the village's curse.
steps: Confront the spirit guarding the bell
quests.success_outcome: The village is freed from despair, bell tolls joyfully.
quests.failure_outcome: The curse deepens, whispers grow louder.

quests.title: Echoes of the Past
quests.summary: Assist a villager in remembering their lost loved ones.
steps: Collect mementos of their lost ones
Hold a memorial at the village].
Keep the villagers safe from lurking threats.
quests.success_outcome: The villager finds closure, and peace returns briefly.
quests.failure_outcome: The grief manifests as a haunting spirit.

quests.title: Trauma's Companion
quests.summary: Help a companion confront their past trauma within the lair.
steps: Face the creature of their fears
Encourage them to confront their trauma directly.
quests.success_outcome: The companion emerges stronger, with a new perspective.
quests.failure_outcome: The trauma manifests, causing a fracture in the group.

quests.title: The Weaving of Fates
quests.summary: A moral dilemma pits the needs of the many against the few.
steps: Choose who to aid in a time of scarce resources
quests.success_outcome: Balance is restored, but at a cost; friendships strained.
quests.failure_outcome: Conflicts rise between factions, escalating distrust.

creatures.behavior: Stalks the living, feeding on sorrow.
creatures.cr_hint: It avoids direct confrontation, preferring terror.

creatures.cr_hint: Its caw invokes an unsettling feeling of loss.

creatures.cr_hint: Known to mimic the cries of loved ones.
